characters

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • characters.Character
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ghost, Pacman

    public abstract class Character
extends javax.swing.JComponent
    This class describes a Character object, which represents movable objects in the Pacman game.
    Author:
    Carl Patenaude, Maxime Gregoire, Matthew Beirouti, Antoine Tu
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Checks if the next Tile is a WallTile.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate of the next Tile.
        y - the y-coordinate of the next Tile.
        d - the direction in which we are searching.
        Returns:
        true if the next Tile is a WallTile.
